name: Mad Merlin’s Magic Mage Mania – Camelot Kingdoms Hero’s Quest
name_original: Mad Merlin’s Magic Mage Mania – Camelot Kingdoms Hero’s Quest
description:
Merlin is mad and he ain’t gonna take it any more! Feel the magic as Merlin takes fiery flight and blasts the Flying Eyeballs of Fate and Slimy Blue Blobs back to the rancid depths from whence they came! This is one pissed-off prestidigitator!

FEATURES:
Weird Magicians!
Awesome Retro Graphics!
Unlock More Wizards!

100% Free!
